title: Part 2: Bill O'Reilly + News (ACS October 3)
itunes:title: Part 2: Bill O'Reilly + News (ACS October 3)
description:
Bill O'Reilly talks to Adam about his new book,  ‘KILLING THE LEGENDS: The Lethal Danger of Celebrity’ which profiles the lives and deaths of Elvis Presley, John Lennon, & Muhammad Ali. Bill outlines the risks and dangers of being a celebrity through Ali joining the Nation of Islam, Lennon signing an album for the man who would later assasinate him, Elvis’ manager ruthlessly controlling his career, and more. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Trevor Noah leaving 'The Daily Show' amid rumors of dating Dua Lipa and a 'Barney' documentary exposing the dark history of the children’s show. 

PLUGS:

Read Bill O'Reilly’s new book ‘KILLING THE LEGENDS: The Lethal Danger of Celebrity’ wherever you find books
